remarks: Swap denominators of two ratios.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
statement:
div1d.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
divcld.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
divmuld.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
divmuldivd.4 $e |- ( ph -> D e. CC ) $.
divmuldivd.5 $e |- ( ph -> B =/= 0 ) $.
divmuldivd.6 $e |- ( ph -> D =/= 0 ) $.
divmul13d $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A / B ) x. ( C / D ) ) = ( ( C / B ) x. ( A / D ) ) ) $.
